root.name: Koto Battle: Tengai no Moribito
root.description: OverviewKoto Battle: Tengai no Moribito is a card battling role-playing game developed by AlphaDream and published by Nintendo for the Game Boy Color platform. Koto Battle: Tengai no Moribito was only released in Japan.
